main event: A civilian reported a UFO sighting on 15 August 1966 in Parkston, South Dakota, observed for 1.5 hours.
interesting points: The object was observed at a 45-degree angle from the horizon., It was described to be very bright and emitted a buzzing sound for about 5 seconds., Two observers provided different size estimates of the object (dime and quarter), indicating its size was difficult to determine., The object exhibited high-speed movement in an up and down pattern., The sighting was documented in a Project Blue Book report, which concluded there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: one bright object in the sky
